constraints.name: range_bound
constraints.description: 数组元素的值域约束，每个元素的取值范围为 0 到 k
constraints.formal: 0 ≤ a_i ≤ k, for all 1 ≤ i ≤ n

constraints.name: operation_limit
constraints.description: 操作次数限制，通过某种操作将数组中的所有元素变为 0 的操作次数不限
constraints.formal: a_i can be made 0 using the operation some (possibly, zero) times

constraints.name: modular_arithmetic
constraints.description: 结果需要对给定的质数 p 取模
